question: Write a letter of complaint to a company outlining a problemyou had while visiting one of their stores. In your letter include:what the problem waswhy this problem has upset youwhat you want to happen as a result of your letter
text: I am writing to you to express some concerns regarding my recent visit to one of your stores located near the Sherbrook metro station. My intention was to pick out a new laptop but everything went awry.

First, I was having a hard time looking for a consultant, seems like everybody disappeared. After several attempts at capturing someone's attention I finally managed to find a worked. As far as I remember, his name was Jack. I asked him to help me choose a laptop of a particular configuration and he recommended  a few models.

I was so delighted that there was exactly what I needed, that is why I did not double-check the computer, paid for it and left the shop. But when I got home, I found out that the processor in my laptop was a completely different one. I understand that it was partially my mistake, I should have checked it before paying. On the flip side, I clearly described my requirements to Jack and he did a poor job helping me. I had to spend some extra time returning the machine. I would be grateful if you speak with your employee and  explain him how it is important to be focused while working with the customers.
If you had any other questions related to this accident, please feel free to contact me on my phone (4383416040).

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase After several attempts at capturing someone's attention. Consider adding a comma.
The phrase following the intransitive verb explain seems to be missing a preposition. Consider adding one.
